summary.note: 16 benchmarks with error data (11 micro + 5 polybench). Both sim and HW use SMALL dataset for polybench. Overall 47.40% average error does NOT meet <20% target due to polybench (in-order vs OoO gap).

infeasible.name: 2mm
infeasible.reason: MINI_DATASET build completed but did not finish within CI timeout. Being rebuilt with MINI_DATASET in branch leo/polybench-mini-2mm-3mm.

infeasible.name: 3mm
infeasible.reason: MINI_DATASET build completed but did not finish within CI timeout. Being rebuilt with MINI_DATASET in branch leo/polybench-mini-2mm-3mm.

infeasible.name: crc32
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 12,499,991,230 instructions in 5B cycles (44m29s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.400. Single iteration of 1024 CRC ops — already at minimum workload, no further reduction possible without altering benchmark semantics.

infeasible.name: edn
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 13,000,000,936 instructions in 5B cycles (45m10s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.385. Parameters N=100, ORDER=50 could theoretically be reduced, but requires cross-compilation rebuild.
infeasible.reduction_possible: N=100, ORDER=50 could be reduced but requires cross-compiler rebuild

infeasible.name: statemate
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 9,210,526,236 instructions in 5B cycles (35m17s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.543. Complex auto-generated state machine with no obvious size reduction parameter.

infeasible.name: primecount
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1, SZ=3, NPRIMES=9 (already maximally reduced). Retired 9,999,999,968 instructions in 5B cycles (42m49s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.500. No further reduction possible — SZ=3 is the absolute minimum.

infeasible.name: huffbench
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. CI run 22019560953 Group 2 still in progress. TEST_SIZE=500 could theoretically be reduced, but requires cross-compilation rebuild.
infeasible.reduction_possible: TEST_SIZE=500 could be reduced but requires cross-compiler rebuild

infeasible.name: matmult-int
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. CI run 22019560953 Group 2 still in progress. UPPERLIMIT=20 (20x20 matrix) could theoretically be reduced, but requires cross-compilation rebuild.
infeasible.reduction_possible: UPPERLIMIT=20 could be reduced (e.g. to 5) but requires cross-compiler rebuild
